import React,{ useEffect }from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {Row, Col ,Image, ListGroup, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import {listHelperDetails} from '../actions/helperActions' const HelperScreens = ({match}) => { const dispatch= useDispatch() const helperDetails=useSelector(state=>state.helperDetails) const {loading,error,helper}=helperDetails const userLogin= useSelector(state=> state.userLogin) const {userInfo}=userLogin const helperReviewCreate= useSelector(state=> state.helperReviewCreate) const {loading:loadingHelperReview,success:successHelperReview,error:errorHelperReview}=helperReviewCreate useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listHelperDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch,match]) return ( <> Go Back {loading?(): error? ({error}): ( <>

{helper.name}

Provides Services as: {helper.occupation_type}

 Description: {helper.description}

Place:

 {helper.place}

For Services:

 {helper.contact}

Reviews

{helper.reviews.length===0 && No Reviews} {helper.reviews.map(review => ( {review.name}

{review.createdAt.substring(0,10)}

{review.comment}

 ))}

Write a Customer Review

{errorHelperReview && {errorHelperReview}} {userInfo? (
Rating setRating(e.target.value)}> Comment setComment(e.target.value)}>
) : Please Sign In to post a Review} )} ) } export default HelperScreens
